channel.title: How Do I Get My Hamachi Server Online?
channel.description:
Hi, Im TheFlamingThunder... Anyway, I've Just Created A New Hamachi Server I Have Edited It And Did Everything But I just Want To Know How To Get The Server Online So My Friends Can Play On it. If You Know Can You Please...I Mean Really Please I've Been Trying To Do This For About 10 Days In a Row Everyday... So PLEASE Tell Me How To Get My Hamachi Server Online I Really Need Help :D
Sincerely, TheFlamingThunder

item.title: How Do I Get My Hamachi Server Online?
item.dc:creator: @ivang ivang
item.description:
@ivang wrote:

get your hamachi server turned on and click the triangle on the bottom and click create network and type in any username preferred is your server name and any password or none at all and then for people to join they type in the ip that is next to your name in the hamachi network in the server: thing

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Get My Hamachi Server Online?

Step 2 - Don’t use Hamachi!
Step 3 - Get No-ip program and register account and server name.
Step 4 - Port Foward
Step - Search button?[/quote]

You couldnt replay any better…

Im actualy giving you rep for that answer

item.title: How Do I Get My Hamachi Server Online?
item.dc:creator: @xwhazza08x xwhazza08x
item.description:
@xwhazza08x wrote:

yes i could help you get your hamnchi server working

ok go on hamnchi and press creat new network for the network u choose a name and for the password do 123
and if people wanted to join they would go on hamnchi and press join network and put in your network name and the password 123
now go to your server files and double click runserver and now its online and on your hamnchi place they will be a number starting with 5. then some other numbers then go on silab or mopar and put in them numbers as the sevrer ip and port number 43594 and your on have fun

Read full topic
